name: PONG PONG (REN)
description:
Developed for a four-day design exercise.

Round-based, four-person free-for-all inspired by Pong and Brick Breaker. Four players, controlling four paddles on the same keyboard, battle it out on-screen and at the desk by bumping, distracting, and outsmarting each other. 

1. Four players battle it out on the same keyboard.

2. Don't let any meteors past you!

3. There will always be one less meteor than there are players.

4. Juggle a meteor 4 times to clear the round.

5. Players that drop a meteor are eliminated.

6. One player is eliminated per round.

7. Last player standing wins!

CONTROLS:

RED: WASD

BLUE: IJKL

GREEN: Arrow Keys

YELLOW: 8456 (Num Pad)
